sentences.en: a particularly virulent form of influenza
A very virulent form of the disease appeared in Belgium.
sentences.cn: 比利时出现了这种疾病的一种极其危险的变体。

sentences.en: Animal experiment showed that it was virulent to mice.
sentences.cn: 动物试验结果表明,该菌对小白鼠有致病力.

sentences.en: Applies virulent or when the radiochemistry goods pays attention protects oneself.
sentences.cn: 应用有毒或放射性化学物品时注意保护自己.

sentences.en: Dog, mink distemper, dog tiny virus and so on virulent diseases.
sentences.cn: 犬 、 水貂的犬瘟热 、 犬细小病毒等病毒性疾病.

sentences.en: Friends spoke of "a virulent personal campaign" being waged against him.
sentences.cn: 朋友们说针对他正在发起“一场恶毒的个人攻击”。

sentences.en: His virulent opposition to Zionism reassured the radicals.
sentences.cn: 他以恶毒的语言反对犹太复国主义,这使激进分子放心.

sentences.en: It woke in some men a virulent hatred of a black skin.
sentences.cn: 在某些人身上这类事会引起他们对黑皮肤的人的刻骨仇恨.

sentences.en: Now he faces virulent attacks from the Italian media.
sentences.cn: 现在他面临着意大利媒体的恶毒攻击。

sentences.en: She is very virulent about her former employer.
sentences.cn: 她对她过去的老板恨之入骨.

sentences.en: The 1,500 - gear - old DNA matched that of P. fatciparurn, the most virulent form of malaria.
sentences.cn: 这个1500年前的DNA与 P. 恶性疟疾的DNA相匹配, 这是一种致病力最强的疟疾致病菌.

sentences.en: The media has waged a virulent hate campaign against her.
sentences.cn: 新闻界向她发起了恶毒攻击。

sentences.en: The test gave consistently positive results with virulent virus.
sentences.cn: 用强毒病毒时,此试验恒定地呈现阳性结果.

sentences.en: The virulent strains had a polysaccharide capsule and formed smooth colonies on agar medium.
sentences.cn: 有毒菌株具有多糖荚膜它在琼脂培养基上形成光滑的菌落.

sentences.en: These monsters may cause particularly virulent illnesses in sharks and fish.
sentences.cn: 这些怪物能导致鲨鱼和其它鱼类患上特别强烈的疾病.

sentences.en: Wilson's difficulties at Paris were compounded by virulent opposition to his peace program in United States.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊在巴黎遇到的困难,由于国内恶性反对他的和平纲领,变得复杂起来.

words.tran_cn: 剧毒的；恶性的；有恶意的

phrases.tran_cn: 强毒株；毒性菌株，有毒菌株

trans.tran_cn: 剧毒的，致命的，恶毒的，憎恨的
trans.tran_en: a poison, disease etc that is virulent is very dangerous and affects people very quickly
